text: Brezovo () is a town in Southern Bulgaria. It is located in Plovdiv oblast and is close to the town of Rakovski. == Populated places == The following towns and villages are located inside the territory of Brezovo municipality: * Babek * Borets * Brezovo * Chehlare * Choba * Drangovo * Otec Kirilovo * Padarsko * Rozovec * Svezhen * Streltsi * Sarnegor * Tyurkmen * Varben * Zelenikovo * Zlatosel Category:Towns in Bulgaria Category:Populated places in Plovdiv Province
title: Brezovo
